DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the bioequivalence of Azithromycin 200mg/5mL oral suspension.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Study of Azithromycin 200mg/5mL Suspension Following a 600mg Dose Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant findings on physical exam, medial history or laboratory tests on screening Positive test for HIV or hepatitis B and C Treatment for Drug or alcohol abuse Any other important criteria in the protocol
